org.finra.herd.service.impl

Class BusinessObjectDataInitiateRestoreHelperServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.service.impl.BusinessObjectDataInitiateRestoreHelperServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BusinessObjectDataInitiateRestoreHelperService

    @Service
public class BusinessObjectDataInitiateRestoreHelperServiceImpl
extends Object
implements BusinessObjectDataInitiateRestoreHelperService
    An implementation of the helper service class for the business object data initiate a restore request functionality.

    • Method Detail

      • executeInitiateRestoreAfterStep

        @PublishNotificationMessages
 @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRES_NEW)
public BusinessObjectData executeInitiateRestoreAfterStep(BusinessObjectDataRestoreDto businessObjectDataRestoreDto)
        Executes an after step for the initiation of a business object data restore request.

        This implementation starts a new transaction.

        Specified by:
        executeInitiateRestoreAfterStep in interface BusinessObjectDataInitiateRestoreHelperService
        Parameters:
        businessObjectDataRestoreDto - the DTO that holds various parameters needed to perform a business object data restore
        Returns:
        the business object data information

      • executeS3SpecificSteps

        @Transactional(propagation=NOT_SUPPORTED)
public void executeS3SpecificSteps(BusinessObjectDataRestoreDto businessObjectDataRestoreDto)
        Executes S3 specific steps for the initiation of a business object data restore request. The method also updates the specified DTO.

        This implementation executes non-transactionally, suspends the current transaction if one exists.

        Specified by:
        executeS3SpecificSteps in interface BusinessObjectDataInitiateRestoreHelperService
        Parameters:
        businessObjectDataRestoreDto - the DTO that holds various parameters needed to perform a business object data restore

      • prepareToInitiateRestore

        @PublishNotificationMessages
 @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRES_NEW)
public BusinessObjectDataRestoreDto prepareToInitiateRestore(BusinessObjectDataKey businessObjectDataKey,
                                                                                                                                    Integer expirationInDays)
        Prepares for the business object data initiate a restore request by validating the business object data along with other related database entities. The method also creates and returns a business object data restore DTO.

        This implementation starts a new transaction.

        Specified by:
        prepareToInitiateRestore in interface BusinessObjectDataInitiateRestoreHelperService
        Parameters:
        businessObjectDataKey - the business object data key
        expirationInDays - the the time, in days, between when the business object data is restored to the S3 bucket and when it expires
        Returns:
        the DTO that holds various parameters needed to perform a business object data restore

        protected void executeS3SpecificStepsImpl(BusinessObjectDataRestoreDto businessObjectDataRestoreDto)
        Executes S3 specific steps for the initiation of a business object data restore request. The method also updates the specified DTO.
        Parameters:
        businessObjectDataRestoreDto - the DTO that holds various parameters needed to perform a business object data restore

      • getStorageUnit

        protected StorageUnitEntity getStorageUnit(BusinessObjectDataEntity businessObjectDataEntity)
        Retrieves storage unit for the business object data. The method validates that there one and only one storage unit for this business object data in "ARCHIVED" state.
        Parameters:
        businessObjectDataEntity - the business object data entity
        Returns:
        the archived storage unit entity

      • prepareToInitiateRestoreImpl

        protected BusinessObjectDataRestoreDto prepareToInitiateRestoreImpl(BusinessObjectDataKey businessObjectDataKey,
                                                                    Integer expirationInDays)
        Prepares for the business object data initiate a restore request by validating the business object data along with other related database entities. The method also creates and returns a business object data restore DTO.
        Parameters:
        businessObjectDataKey - the business object data key
        expirationInDays - the the time, in days, between when the business object data is restored to the S3 bucket and when it expires
        Returns:
        the DTO that holds various parameters needed to perform a business object data restore
